Uses of Filter in sensors.filters
 

Subclasses of Filter in sensors.filters
 class AveragingFilter
          A Filter that uses a moving average with the aim of smoothing out signal noise
 class DifferentialFilter
          A Filter that uses the discrete derivative to detect sudden changes in sensor input
 class ExampleFilter
           
 class MedianFilter
          This filter takes the median inside of a moving window.
 class OutlierFilter
          Formalization of filter provided in lab 1 that removes non consecutive false positives.
 class SavitzkyGolay
          A Filter that uses a weighted moving average using convolution coefficients with the aim of having a faster and more effective smoothing out of signal noise
